author: 9GAG
description: 9GAG is a global community of people who share laughter. Laugh more. 9GAG is your best source of fun. Share anything you find interesting, get real responses from people all over the world, and discover what makes you laugh. • Featuring the best collection of Rage comics, memes, fail image, cute pets video, demotivational pictures, killing time just got a whole lot funnier • Be forever alone no more! Share joke and pics with the world on Facebook, Twitter or email • Browse and vote your way through picture on Hot, Trending and Vote, and leave comments Get the official 9GAG app now!
